2. Data: you don't have to list protocols and notebooks here, they fit better under 4.

7. Sharing: have you considered using repositories for data preservation and sharing? If there are disciplinary repositories these will also add specific metadata, reading the guidelines may help you to decide what to write in the explanatory notes (readme files). If there is no suitable disciplinary repository you can use KU Leuven RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr)
